text:
October 16, 1959
Dr. Marshall McLuhan
96 Saint Joseph Street
Toronto 5
Ontario, Canada
Dear Marshalls
Thanks for the excellent clippings. We'll try to get 'em around,
where they'll do some good.
Glad the street address problem is all set. Sorry for printer's
delay on the stationery. Will add P. S. on this. Tried to check
by phone, but no one answered.
There may be some useful contacts at the Detroit Convention. Looks
like & big registration. With the schedule I have of appointments,
committee meetings, and details, also looks like another rat-race
for me.
Best,
Harry J. Skornia
Executive Director
HJSrjp
P. S. Stationery and envelopes will be delivered to us on Tuesday j
October 20. We'll get it right off to you.
